website_summaries.verdict: Fewer tools than some other products, but it contains all of the tools you'll use most often.
pros: Very good quality in its tools, considering the price you'll pay
Tough tool box case that doesn't require a lot of room to store
Works best for someone who needs a collection of basic tools as a first-time homeowner
cons: Price is a little high for 100 tools
A few of the tools are much smaller than you'd expect

customer_reviews.title: Tools ok; tape measure is metric; and case is unmanageable
customer_reviews.text: Overall, this was a good selection of tools for a first time home owner, except the tape measure was metric, which is useless in the USA. The case was useless, too. It was difficult to fit tools back into their slots so the case would close completely. I ended up buying another tape measure and a tool chest at Home Depot to put the tools in & throwing out the case.
customer_reviews.author: Rcs45

customer_reviews.title: Good tool kit but a few catches
customer_reviews.text: Some of the items don't like to stay in their place because they don't fit well. And yes, the measuring tape is in meters which is inconvenient. Overall, I love what I got for this set and it has been very useful for my first tool kit.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan Tice

customer_reviews.title: Nice set
customer_reviews.text: Looks like a good selection of tools I have not used yours yet as I have several similar sets that I have used for years but yours does include more of the tools that I could use
customer_reviews.author: Michael S.

customer_reviews.title: It’s great
customer_reviews.text: A great product with quick delivery. I would buy from this seller again. A+++++
customer_reviews.author: MERRITT ANDERSON

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: It is okay set. The box cannot hold some of the tools. Anyway, it serves its purpose well.
customer_reviews.author: Toan Diep

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: nice for a beginner or somebody that doesn't use tools that much!
customer_reviews.author: K. Boscarino

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This was a perfect extra set to have on our boat!
customer_reviews.author: T. Lippke

customer_reviews.title: Great but not perfect.
customer_reviews.text: Was for the most part pretty good, Rating 4 stars because one there were weird chips on some of the tools and two the Hex Key Set is clearly not made for this tool box it fits into it's spot really awkwardly .
customer_reviews.author: Ryan

customer_reviews.title: Happy consumer here
customer_reviews.text: Was everything I needed and more. Was pleasantly surprised at the prompt delivery. Happy consumer here!
customer_reviews.author: HenryRz

customer_reviews.title: Tool Kit
customer_reviews.text: Our son and family had just moved into his new house rented an apartment before. Set him up and he was very pleased with the kit.
customer_reviews.author: Krystyna

customer_reviews.title: Terrible
customer_reviews.text: Junk! Came in all Chinese writing and its metric. Do not buy
customer_reviews.author: Caitlyn Straub

customer_reviews.title: Great backup set of tools!
customer_reviews.text: Great backup set of tools for car, home, etc...nice selection of tools...
customer_reviews.author: Beserki

customer_reviews.title: Multipurpose toolkit
customer_reviews.text: Nice little multipurpose toolkit that should cover a variety of the most common repairs found around the home.
customer_reviews.author: David Richardson

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very nice tool set. Everything in one place and it arrived so fast. Great company!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Excellenty assembled and organized. Very practical and handy for home use.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Childs Play
customer_reviews.text: This is not at all what I was expecting, the hammer and saw are both extremely small and tools don't seem all that strong, reminds me of a child's play-set instead of a home repair tool set. Make matters even worse this set arrived with a horrible smell that gave me a migraine, not the way I'd expect to receive any package regardless of what it is.
customer_reviews.author: Brandy

product_meta.title: 100-Piece Home Tool Kits OUTAD Multi-functional & Universal 100 IN 1 Precision Screwdriver Hammer Set Repair Tool Kit for Household Electronics Test Repair Maintenance
product_meta.description:
Specifications:

Mini Saw size: 255x90x20mm

Claw Hammer size: 235x106x22mm

Packge size: 395*300*88mm

Tool color: Black & red

1 x Digital voltage tester

1 x Electrical Tape

10 x Bit Storage

1 x Adjustable Wrench

2 x mini Phillips Screwdriver

1 x Slotted Screwdriver

1 x Phillips Screwdriver

1 x Multifunctional screwdriver handle

1 x Long Nose Plier

41 x Screws

27 x Expansion tube set
feature_bullets: Comprehensive multi-functional household tool set contains the most reached tools for constructing, repairing or performing maintenance on precision electronics test projects and hardware upgrades.
Professional standard driver bits and sockets made from high-grade steel for strength, durability and maximum torque.
Moulded tool box case for easy storage and transportation
Ergonomically designed and easy-to-use mechanical operation accessories.
The overall hardening, compact and lightweight, perfect tools with high quality standards for household tasks, repairments, maintenance, manufacture
